explanation.num_tested_probands: Methods: Collecting clinical information of 17 patients with pathogenic variants in PIGN, PIGA, and PIGT.
explanation.num_positive_het_probands: Mutation analysis identified seven different hemizygous PIGA mutations… among eight patients… Seven of the mutations were inherited from their mothers, and only one was de novo.
explanation.num_compound_or_double_hets: Mutation analysis identified seven different hemizygous PIGA mutations… among eight patients… Seven of the mutations were inherited from their mothers, and only one was de novo.
